attributes.action: let immigrants prove their worth by doing national service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i propose that due to increasing number of immigrants in the country we shall let them prove that they are willing to fight for our country to be let in (if they havent got a job in 6wks they should be sent for national service.)therfore it will give them a better respect to be in the country.
